title: LoL client stuck at reconnect screen!! HELP!
body: So,I was playing norms and around mid game everybody dced.Evyerone reconnected and we lost the game.I got stuck at "waiting for stats" screen so I decided to skip.When I tried to play another game It said I was still on a game.So I closed my client completely and re-log but not im stuck on the reconnect screen despite the game being finished.

replies.body: Same happened to me once i just had to click reconnect and it said something like: the game is no longer available click ok to return to the main menu. Hope that helped
I just had the same issue in a ranked game over 1 hour ago it still tries to reconnect and keeps failing so im stuck and not able to play a a game :(
I have no idea how to fix it then. Perhaps emailing riot will give you an answer??

Thanks for the reply!!

I just had to wait it out.Turns out that you have to wait 2 hours for the client to fix itself.
It is my pleasure KingX maybe we can friend on lol and play together?? :)
